quest.name: Not Just Any Banquet
objectives: Place the rotting fish at the designated locations and slay the hungry giant coralshells that appear for their legs.
Deliver the giant coralshell legs to Kaioke.

dialogue.name: KAIOKE
dialogue.text: MadamSir! Am I correct to assume you are from the surface? While I am loath to have to ask a favor─especially of a visitor such as yourself─I am afraid I have nowhere left to turn.

dialogue.name: KAIOKE
dialogue.text: You see, a couple times a year we will hold a village-wide banquet where each person brings their own signature dish. As I have been charged with organizing the event, attending to the main preparations has left me with little time to collect the necessary ingredients for my food!

dialogue.name: KAIOKE
dialogue.text: Nearly everyone has finished making theirs, but I have yet to even begin! Readying the broth takes the longest, so I must start that now. To complete it, however, I need the legs of two giant coralshells.

dialogue.name: KAIOKE
dialogue.text: Please, might you obtain them for me?

dialogue.name: KAIOKE
dialogue.text: They can be found on the coast of Onokoro. Here─take this bait. Giant coralshells are reticent creatures but the smell of that should be enough to attract them out of hiding.

dialogue.name: KAIOKE
dialogue.text: Please bring me legs of two giant coralshells. In the meantime, I shall put a pot on the stove and begin preparing my broth.

dialogue.name: KAIOKE
dialogue.text: <sniff> <sniff> Ah, if I am not mistaken that is the piquant scent of coralshell that clings gently to your clothes.

dialogue.name: KAIOKE
dialogue.text: Haha! Look at the size of these legs! Added to that, the meat inside appears very tender and succulent. Once they are added to the stew and boiled, it will be ready to serve!

dialogue.name: KAIOKE
dialogue.text: Truth be told, these banquets are not all about having fun. In fact, some might say it is a silent competition to see who can serve the best food. The individual to bring the most delicious dish is usually awarded the honor of hosting the next one.

dialogue.name: KAIOKE
dialogue.text: Thanks to you and these delicious legs you have brought back for me, my victory is all but guaranteed!
